mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC) "RNUM", BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS "COMMENT_COUNT", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS "LIKE_COUNT",
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS "BOARD_WRITE_DATE"
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
